attributes.action: stop the use of the word "chillax" in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
once upon a time, there were respected, revered members of a community, some say articulate, some say witty, sadly this era has come to an end with the introduction of the term "chillax" into their lexicon. 

please help stop the spread of this very uncool bastardistion of the english language.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
